entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
